messageBody:
On Tuesday 27 January 2004 01:48, mona_r_ahuja wrote:
> I need to unit test this method i.e I need to make sure that it has
> infact started the integrityChecker thread . How do I do this since
> the the object integrityChecker is local to this method.

Quick hack (not tried myself): Assuming the newly started thread belongs
to the same thread group as the current one: obtain that group using
Thread.getThreadGroup() and compare the activeCount() before and after
calling the code under test.

Robert
